name: Tap.Tap.Tap Free - finger speed test
description:
★★★ How sharp is your reflex? ★★★

Are you above or under normal human speed. Test your reflex and speed now with this simple and very addictive speed game! Tap.Tap.Tap gameplay is so easy that almost everyone can play it. You can compare your result against your friends or globally with game center. Game contains four game modes where you can compete, so you can get better understanding how sharp your reflex are and how long you can keep your focus.

★ Easy gameplay
★ Game center supported
★ Today, Weekly and All time scores
★ Global/Friends scores
★ Share results

[ MORE GAMES ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type ”codecube brothers” to itunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ FEEDBACK ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support@ccbrothers.com
